traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The subchief can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Tooth Dagger
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Jaws of Semuanya {@recharge 5}
entries: The subchief invokes the primal magic of Semuanya, summoning a spectral maw around a target it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8 damage) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The subchief is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:
